selectionMode.description: Defines the quantity of the selection.

dateFormat.description: Format of the date. Defaults to PrimeVue Locale configuration.

inline.description: When enabled, displays the calendar as inline instead of an overlay.

showOtherMonths.description: Whether to display dates in other months (non-selectable) at the start or end of the current month. To make these days selectable use the selectOtherMonths option.

selectOtherMonths.description: Whether days in other months shown before or after the current month are selectable. This only applies if the showOtherMonths option is set to true.

showIcon.description: When enabled, displays a button with icon next to input.

previousIcon.description: Icon to show in the previous button.

nextIcon.description: Icon to show in the next button.

incrementIcon.description: Icon to show in each of the increment buttons.

decrementIcon.description: Icon to show in each of the decrement buttons.

responsiveOptions.description: An array of options for responsive design.

touchUI.description: When enabled, calendar overlay is displayed as optimized for touch devices.

monthNavigator.description: Whether the month should be rendered as a dropdown instead of text.

yearNavigator.description: Whether the year should be rendered as a dropdown instead of text.

yearRange.description: The range of years displayed in the year drop-down in (nnnn:nnnn) format such as (2000:2020).

maxDateCount.description: Maximum number of selectable dates in multiple mode.

showOnFocus.description: When disabled, datepicker will not be visible with input focus.

baseZIndex.description: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

showButtonBar.description: Whether to display today and clear buttons at the footer.

shortYearCutoff.description: The cutoff year for determining the century for a date.

showSeconds.description: Whether to show the seconds in time picker.

hideOnDateTimeSelect.description: Whether to hide the overlay on date selection when showTime is enabled.

hideOnRangeSelection.description: Whether to hide the overlay on date selection is completed when selectionMode is range.

showWeek.description: When enabled, calendar will show week numbers.

manualInput.description: Whether to allow entering the date manually via typing.

disabled.description: When present, it specifies that the component should be disabled.

readonly.description: When present, it specifies that an input field is read-only.

appendTo.description: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.

inputId.description: Identifier of the underlying input element.

inputStyle.description: Inline style of the input field.

inputClass.description: Style class of the input field.

inputProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLInputElement to the focusable input element inside the component.

panelStyle.description: Inline style of the overlay panel.

panelClass.description: Style class of the overlay panel.

panelProps.description: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLDivElement to the overlay panel inside the component.

aria-labelledby.description: Establishes relationships between the component and label(s) where its value should be one or more element IDs.

aria-label.description: Establishes a string value that labels the component.

pt.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

ptOptions.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.params: (value: undefined | string | string[] | Date | Date[]) => void

events.name: input
events.description: Callback to invoke when input field is being typed.

events.name: date-select
events.description: Callback to invoke when a date is selected.

events.name: show
events.description: Callback to invoke when datepicker panel is shown.

events.name: hide
events.description: Callback to invoke when datepicker panel is hidden.

events.name: today-click
events.description: Callback to invoke when today button is clicked.

events.name: clear-click
events.description: Callback to invoke when clear button is clicked.

events.name: month-change
events.description: Callback to invoke when a month is changed using the navigators.

events.name: year-change
events.description: Callback to invoke when a year is changed using the navigators.

events.name: focus
events.description: Callback to invoke on focus of input field.

events.name: blur
events.description: Callback to invoke on blur of input field.

events.name: keydown
events.description: Callback to invoke when a key is pressed.
